summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Torre Lapillo Guest Portal. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with minor UI issues and some missing pages.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepting clicks on some navigation elements
Missing data-testid='add-beach-btn' selector for add beach button

design_issues.issue: Bottom navigation may not have all 4 required tabs (Guida, Alloggio, Servizi, Aiuto) as specified in requirements
Some required pages may be missing: Restaurants (Ristoranti), Activities (Attivita), Maps (Mappe), Transport (Trasporti), Help (Aiuto)

passed_tests: All public API endpoints working (beaches, restaurants, experiences, rentals, map-info, transports)
Splash page with 'Your Journey' logo and 'Iniziamo' button
Dashboard with accommodation card and quick actions grid
Accommodation page with Wi-Fi, check-in/out, rules, contacts, FAQ cards
Beaches page with filters and data loading
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Add missing pages: DiningPage (ristoranti), ActivitiesPage (attivita), MapsPage (mappe), TransportPage (trasporti), HelpPage (aiuto). 2. Fix bottom navigation to include all 4 required tabs. 3. Add missing data-testid attributes for better testability. 4. Fix overlay issues with navigation elements.
